title: Fat Albert's Easter Special
description: Fat Albert and the Cosby kids are backand this time they are Easter egg hunting. Join Fat Albert, Rudy, Weird Harold, Mushmouth, Dumb Donald and the rest of the crew as they celebrate the Easter season as only the Cosby kids can. They will sing, laugh and rejoice their way through this historic holiday! The Fat Albert Easter Special is making its video debut  never before released!!!
